1.content:
Your walking down the road on your way home from school in the city, and you see an old man run towards you. He sees you and you stop, then he starts reaching in his bag. You think your about to get robbed before he brings a colorful rock out.

Old Man: There’s no time, take this rock and throw it in the woods somewhere. Just don’t let anyone find it, it’s too powerful for this planet!

You see him run around a corner and hear a weird warping sound, you look around and see nobody. You were sure he was just a random crackhead and keep heading home. On the way back, you see your hot neighbor and whisper to yourself.

Bill: She would be so hot with bigger tits.

You look back and see her boobs growing out of her shirt, she screams and runs inside. You knew it had to be the rock, it was too much of a coincidence. You think about what you wanted to do next.
1.title: The beginning

11.content: You walk in the door and realize your whole family’s home, you can do anything you want. Who do you want to change first?
11.title: Go home to your family

choices: Give her the body she wants
111.content:
You walk to the back and see your mom in the hot tub, relaxing after working all day.

Bill- Hey mom, what’s up?
Mom- Nothing honey, just calming my nerves after today. What do you want for dinner?
Bill- I’m cool with whatever, do we have any more burgers?
Mom- No but I’ll go get some in a minute.
Bill- You dont have to, ill eat whatever you want. You don’t always have to make what I want.
Mom- I just want you to be happy sweetie, plus I’m not eating. I’m trying to loose weight, I want to look like I used to in college.

What do you do to your mom?
111.title: Mom

1111.content:
You grab the stone real quick and think of the hottest body you can. You think of the Instagram model “kkvsh.” Your mom starts to feel uncomfortable and starts moving around, not noticing what’s going on since she can’t see under the water. She gets out after a few minutes and her ass was so big it burst out of her bottoms. She had the exact same body from the waist down as the girl you thought of, really only keeping her skin color and head. She even opened her mouth and a huge tongue came out, same as the model has.

Mom: What the hell happened?? I guess wishes really do come true.

She goes upstairs to get a pair of pants on, but non Of them even fit past her thighs. She grabs a pair of your dads sweat pants and goes to the mall to shop. You wonder what else you could do to your family and think that Lisa is in her room. You go in and see she’s talking to her boyfriend on FaceTime. What do you do to her?
1111.title: Give her the body she wants

14.content:
"I wish my dick was unreasonably big."

Bills dick got stupid big. next wish.
14.title: Use on self now

info.brief_description: Your given a stone from a old man that’s trying to get rid of it. This might get fun.
info.description:
This interactive is about you as an 18 year old Senior named Bill. You get a hold of a stone that can do anything to anyone. Anything you can think that would change a person you can do, from small mental changes to otherworldly creations. Anything is possible, add what you want.

FAMILY

Bill- 18, average body, basic social life, as normal as possible to be able to put yourself in that role.
Mom- 42, chubby mom body, typical nice mom that works at a hair salon and does most of the housework.
Dad- 46, average dad bod, works as a stock broker, he works allot but he’s a caring dad and takes the family on vacation every year.
Danny- 24, starting to get fat, your older brother that works at a car dealership after getting a communications degree. He’s cool and gets you weed for cheap.
Lisa- 18, hot twin sister, she’s the closest to you in your family and your best friend. You tell her everything, and you get messed with by all your friends that they’re gunna fuck her.
Hayley- 14, average body, your little sister that is kind of a brat. She throws fits a lot but gets what she wants because your family’s kinda rich.
Ben- 8, little brother, not much to say, he just loves video games and baseball.

FRIENDS

David- Your best friend for years, normal body, chill and likable.
Cam- Your newer good friend, very athletic, Funny but dick head.
Nicole- Close friend, fit and hot body, ditsy but smart.
Maddy- Your ex girlfriend, slightly chubby, still friends but distant.
Kelsey- Hot friend you were friend zoned by, bitch but funny, fit body.
(Yes I used the ones from my other story, kill me.)
Add more characters and different outcomes as well.
